active.title: We Get The Picture – # Speed  # Transparency  # Quilaty  # Teamwork
active.subTitle1: We're thrilled that many of you joined our events in 2023.
active.subTitle2: Now, we're excited to unveil the theme for 2024: 'Global Village.'
active.subTitle3: With enhanced ESG concepts and event rules, we promise an even more immerse experience!
